title: Profile stitch identity
description: Profile stitch identity is used to clearly distinguish profile stitching from multiple sources. `ProfileStitchIdentity` is established by an profile stitch identity provider, which itself is referenced in the `namespace` attribute. Within each `namespace`, the profileStitchIdentity is unique.

@id.title: Identifier
@id.description: Identity of the profile stitch in the related namespace.

xdm:namespace.title: Namespace
xdm:namespace.description: The namespace associated with the `xid` attribute.

xdm:xid.title: Experience identifier
xdm:xid.description: When present, this value represents a cross-namespace identifier that is unique across all namespace-scoped identifiers in all namespaces.
